name: PulseRift
description:
1) YOU ARE IN A NEO SCI-FI ATOMIC SECTOR.

2) YOUR JOB IS TO KILL THE ROGUE ROBOTS AND COLLECT AS MUCH PULSES AS YOU CAN. [PULSES ARE USED TO BUY PULSEJETS IN THE SHOP] 

3) YOU ARE PROVIDED WITH A RIFLE, A PISTOL AND A GRENADE (USE THE NUMERIC BUTTONS: 1,2,3 TO EQUIP THE RESPECTIVE WEAPON) 

4) VARIOUS PICKUPS WILL SPAWN IN WAREHOUSES & LABS TO HELP YOU FIGHT THE ROGUE ROBOTS.

5] YOU CAN USE YOUR SPECIAL ABILTY OF RIFTING (USING W.S.A.D T] TO DODGE THE INCOMING ATTACKS. 

6) TRY TO SURVIVE AS LONG AS POSSIBLE! GOODLUCK!

This is my second game made in Unity, it is still in development and the bugs will be fixed soon.

Please comment down your feedback, Thank You!
